faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about using YouTranscripts to generate YouTube video transcripts.
faq.tryButton: Try YouTube Transcript Generator for free

questions.a1: A YouTube transcript is the full text of everything spoken in a video, generated by YouTube's caption engine or a third-party tool. It lets you read, search and repurpose your video content as text.
questions.q2: How do I generate a YouTube transcript for any video?
questions.a2: Just paste your YouTube video URL into YouTranscripts (youtranscripts.com), click Generate Transcript, and get the complete text in seconds‚Äîno manual typing needed.
questions.q3: Is YouTube transcript generation free to use?
questions.a3: Yes‚Äîour YouTube transcript tool is 100% free. You can generate and download unlimited transcripts without signup, fees, or hidden charges.
questions.q4: How do I download YouTube video transcripts in TXT, DOC, PDF or SRT format?
questions.a4: After generating your transcript on youtranscripts.com, click Download and choose TXT, DOC, PDF or SRT. Your YouTube video transcript will save instantly in the format you need.
questions.q5: Can I translate YouTube transcripts to other languages?
questions.a5: Absolutely. Click Translate Transcript, select any target language, and our tool will deliver an accurate, translated YouTube transcript ready for reading or export.
questions.q6: Is there a limit to video length or number of transcripts I can generate?
questions.a6: Nope‚Äîthere's no maximum video length or usage cap. YouTranscripts handles videos of any duration and lets you create as many transcripts as you like.
questions.q7: How accurate are the transcripts generated by YouTube video transcript generator by YouTranscripts?
questions.a7: Accuracy depends on audio quality and speaker clarity. On clear, well-recorded videos, you'll see ~90%+ accuracy. And you can always edit any remaining errors before exporting.

about.title: About YouTranscripts
about.subtitle: The free YouTube transcript generator you can trust

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: YouTranscripts was created with a simple mission: to make YouTube content more accessible to everyone. We believe that the valuable information, education, and entertainment found in YouTube videos should be available in text format for those who prefer reading, need to reference specific parts, or require accessibility options.
mission.p2: Our free tool allows anyone to quickly generate transcripts from any YouTube video, translate them into multiple languages, and download them in various formats for different uses.
mission.p3: Founded in 2023, YouTranscripts has quickly become a trusted resource for students, researchers, content creators, and professionals worldwide who need quick and reliable access to YouTube video content in text form.

free.title: Free Transcript Generation
free.description: Generate transcripts from any YouTube video without paying a penny. No hidden fees, no subscriptions, just a simple and effective service.
